title: From Venezuela to American Brain Trauma Specialist - An Interview with Dr. Marcel Ponton
itunes:title: From Venezuela to American Brain Trauma Specialist - An Interview with Dr. Marcel Ponton
description: Dr. Pontón is the CEO and Founder of Persona Neurobehavior Group. For the past 27+ years, he has focused on the neuropsychological assessment and treatment of individuals with catastrophic injuries. He is an expert witness in the fields of head injury and trauma. Dr Pontón is also an Associate Clinical Professor in the Department of Psychiatry at UCLA.
